article.title: SBD to Provide Defense Acquisition University Information Technology
article.text: SBD Alliant LLC, Vienna, Virginia, is being awarded a $10,205,502 order (HQ0034-14-F-0182) under General Services Administration's Alliant small business government-wide acquisition hybrid firm-fixed-price, time-and-materials contract GS-06F-0656Z to provide information technology services for the Defense Acquisition University. Washington Headquarters Services, Arlington, Virginia, is the contracting activity.
